mapper.select: SELECT no, name, password, content, reg_date regDate FROM guestbook ORDER BY no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guestbook VALUES (seq_guestbook_no.nextval, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT B.r, no, name, password, content, reg_date regDate FROM(SELECT rownum r, no, name, password, content, reg_date FROM (SELECT no, name, password, content, reg_date FROM guestbook ORDER BY reg_date desc) A )B WHERE r >= (#{page}-1) * 5 + 1 AND r <= #{page} * 5
